content.longDescription: We’re keeping it crunchy with our Original Tender Crunch Bowl. How crunchy? Well, a mouthful contains Original Recipe Tenders, corn chips (crunch), Twister sauce and dressed slaw (more crunch) plus a regular Chips and a Drink.
